titles.title: For The Lamb, Who Is In The Midst

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For the Lamb, Who is in the midst
Of the throne will be their Shepherd
And He will guide them to the spring
Of the waters of life.
And God will wipe every tear
From their eyes.
And they shall cry, Amen.
Glorify the Living God.
Alleluia, sing unto His name,
Forever more...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Porque el cordero, que en el trono esta.
El pastor de ellos sera.
Y junto a fuentes de agua de vida
El Señor los guiara.
Y enjuagara toda lagrima de sus ojos.
Y clamaran, Amen.
Glorificando a el Señor.
Allelujah! Cantaran a Dios,
Por eternidad.
